scripts.pre:commit: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/web -- npm run build && npx lerna exec --scope @packages/web -- npm run build
scripts.server:dev: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/server -- npm run dev
scripts.server:build: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/server -- npm run build
scripts.server:start: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/server -- npm run start
scripts.web:dev: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/web -- npm run dev
scripts.web:build: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/web -- npm run build
scripts.web:start: npx lerna exec --scope @packages/web -- npm run start
scripts.build: echo "[ BUILDING GLOBAL PACKAGES ]" && npm run global:build && echo "[ BUILDING SERVER ]" && npm run server:build && echo "[ BUILDING WEB ]" && npm run web:build
scripts.global:build: npx lerna exec --scope @global/* -- npm run build
